segments.text: Excuse me , driver . Does this bus go to the museum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you get off at the square .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you will get there in about half an hour if the traffic isn't too heavy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you.How much is the fare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Drop 50 cents in the box , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please let me know when we get to the stop ? I am a stranger here .
segments.speaker: S1
